attributes.action: We demand a rebate on UK Gas and Electricity Bills!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
UK citizens are being taken to the cleaners once again in "Rip-off Britain". As gas and electricity wholesale prices have fallen, suppliers have refused to pass on that reduction to UK households, despite the UK suffering a second colder than average winter.

Fuel poverty is now a major issue in the UK. At a time when economic stimulus is needed to bring the country out of recession, excessive profits are instead being directed towards shareholders at the expense of the wider economy.

We demand a rebate on our gas and electricity bills - NOW!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
